Thank you Mr. Richardson  for taking the time to review our company. We appreciate the opportunity to provide you with our services. We always strive for perfection. Can you please give us a call to let us know what we can do to improve and make a perfect 5 from you? Again, Thank you sir for being a customer.
Thank you for your review. We appreciate you taking the time to do it.
Tha k you Cindy for our 5 stars! We appreciate you!

review.comment: Never called me back; I left a message for quote and information. Don't know about the actual pest service.
review.review_reply:
Katherine, I am so sorry to see your review. We have checked our voicemails and emails and do not see where you have left a message. Our office staff is down four people due to sickness and family matters and we have one person working herself silly.
If you would provide your email and address location and what you are seeking a quote for, I will get that typed up and sent to you.

review.comment: I love to work with these guys. JOHNNY is great
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for the review. We are always striving for our customers satisfaction. We appreciate you Merrick Inv.

review.comment: Good work and prices.  Been using them for a decade on all my properties.  Realtor Tami

We’ve been using Eco Advantage for going on 2 years now. They perform our yearly termite service/inspection and quarterly pest/bug service. Very pleased with how we are treated and the service they provide. Would recommend you give them a call and see how they can be of service to you.
Thanks to Derrick for your efforts, friendliness  and courtesy.
review.review_reply: William, we are thrilled about your satisfaction. Thank you for your continued support and review here on Google. I am sure Derrick takes great care of you, you are in good hands with him.

review.comment:
OK, let's talk about these guys for just a second.  Bought a new house and they came out to do the inspection.  Didn't find any active infestations thank goodness.  I sent payment.  Closed on the house, moved in.  All was right with the world.  Yesterday, I get a piece of mail from them and I'm thinking, GREAT, here's where a company tries to cold call me into some contract 'cuz I just bought a new house.  I open the letter and what do I find?  A nice letter explaining that my closing attorney also paid them out of closing costs (I should've paid closer attention but didn't) and a reimbursement check for the inspection cost.  WHAT?!?  I would have NEVER known about it, but this company's integrity and professionalism compelled them to do the right thing where MANY others wouldn't have.

THANK YOU!  Should I need any future service, these folks will be choice #1!
review.review_reply: Awwwhh, I don't know why I didn't see this review sooner, but it warms my heart to know that you took the time out of your day to post this lovely review. Although it has been a minute since you posted this, Pre-Covid, we hope you are enjoying your home. Stay safe and be well. From, the Eco Family
Thank you Michael, we appreciate your confidence and support.

review.comment: Good honest company that does a great job knows the business
review.review_reply: Thank you Don. We appreciate you and your review.

review.comment: Love these people. They showed great detail,and professionalism,I have dogs and Eco Advantage help keep the creepy craw lies down.
review.review_reply: Thank you Anna, we love you and your dogs! We appreciate your business.

review.comment: I use this service annually and Brian has always brought a friendly face and a professional attitude while getting the job done!!  Thanks for keeping those  pests away!
review.review_reply: Thank you Tonya. We are very appreciative for your review and will always strive for your satisfaction.

review.comment: Very good place, love the owners attention to detail
review.review_reply: Thank you Tonya. We appreciate you as a customer and thank you for taking the time to contact us. Your trust is very important.

review.comment: Im currently in VA looking to purchase a home in NC.(we are a military family) I called Eco advantage on a Thursday and they were able to fit me in on the coming Monday between 9-11. Inspector came out (late)went into crawlspace and upon exiting went on to tell me he's a contractor on the side and for $100 more he could go in and remove insulation to look for further damage. The home was currently occupied and the inspector was unable to look at the water heater and the garage. He also claimed he couldn't move pine needles away from the base exterior of the house because he would be there too long. We eventually decided against the home due to further inspection so I receive a call to pay the bill and they want full payment for half a job. After being told my realtor needs to send me elsewhere next time to find a termite inspector, the receptionist agreed to have me pay half the bill. Unprofessional and lazy! Wasn't planning on returning for next termite inspection and wouldn't recommend!
review.review_reply: I am very sorry you have had a negative experience with our company. We always strive to satisfy our customers. It is never a desire to disappoint anyone. Please allow me to respond publicly to your comments and offer our position to other readers. As for the time of arrival there is a window to allow for the inspector to arrive. We cannot and do not give an exact time as to the arrival. We allow for an hour for each service and drive time. At times traffic, is a bear. Also, perhaps the customer at the previous home required a little more time to explain the service. The owner, Johnnie, was the inspector at your home . He is not a contractor “on the side”, he is a license NC General Contractor. Our company does not remove the insulation on homes prior to a service. That indeed would be more than the fee you paid as that altogether would be a separate service requiring much more time thus a larger fee. Our inspections are visible inspections as to what the inspector sees at the time of inspection. If there is an area that is covered that is preventing the area to be completely inspected, that is indicated on the report. Nonetheless, there is no removal of items on your home to do the inspection. A complete home inspection by a home inspector would be the person you need to call for that type of inspection. Our company looks for visible signs of wood destroying insects and other conducive conditions. The service was performed and yes we asked for payment for the service we completed. It was a complete service and not a partial service. If you would like the portion of the home to be inspected that is covered in full insulation, perhaps having someone to remove the insulation of the entire area prior to the inspection would be helpful to your next inspection and your next home. Thank you again for the partial payment.

review.comment: Great work, highly recommend, explained all products they used and what for and even came back out when I notice some bugs. Great prices and quarterly services.
These guys are the best, I refer them to everyone. These guys are super friendly and take care of their customers.
review.review_reply: Thanks Kelly. I didn’t know that I could respond until just now when I had to respond to an unhappy customer😔. We will always strive to be the best but that is clear after several years in business that will not be the case for every transaction.
